title: Soulshaping: Adventures in Self-Creation
description: The true story of a criminal lawyer called to a more heartfelt path, SOULSHAPING is every person's journey from self-alienation to soul-satisfaction in the heart of modern life. That journey is all about the the inner world, the inner wild, the inner break for freedom from the shackles of shame, fear and misidentification. SOULSHAPING is a courageous inner travelogue that inspires us to do the real work of excavating and honoring who we really are, before our opportunity passes. It is a call to question the misguided self-concepts that are fed to us by the outer world, and to faithfully begin our own private revolution- a revolution of the spirit. The very personal writing style is so deeply honest and self-admitting that the reader cannot help but let their guard down and self-reveal as well. This wonderful book presents a new and distinctly human paradigm for expanding our Ascending with Both Feet on the Ground. This paradigm is rooted in the reality of our dail
author: Jeff  Brown
